spec_data.Name: perl-Pod-MinimumVersion
spec_data.Description:
Pod::MinimumVersion parses the POD in a Perl script, module, or document,
and reports what version of Perl is required to process the directives in
it with pod2man etc.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 03:18:01 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Perl version for POD directives used
